title: Dois Riachos
text:
Dois Riachos is a <a href="Municipalities%20of%20Brazil">municipality</a> located in the West of the <a href="States%20of%20Brazil">Brazilian state</a> of <a href="Alagoas">Alagoas</a>. Its population is 11,067 (2020) and its area is 140 km².
Dois Riachos is the birthplace of <a href="Marta%20%28footballer%29">Marta</a>, among the most notable woman <a href="association%20football">football</a> players in the world.
